name: Shattered Rocket
description:
A 72-hour GMC Jam entry for the Build And Use theme, Shattered Rocket is about combining different rocket suit parts to match your playing style, then take flight avoiding stuff on the way to the enemy airship cores! Over 1100 different combinations are available, and the stats are also affect by which of the 5 playable characters you stuff into the suit!

Will you use clunky armor plates that make you run into things all the time but let you take a couple of hits, or the skimpiest stuff available that gives perfect control but turns you into a fine red paste the moment you nudge against anything? Or do some sort of middle ground? It's all up to you!

  • Positional randomization allows for different experiences each time you play through a level!
  • Unlockable characters!
  • Over 1100 different suit combinations, each with different stats directly affecting gameplay!
  • Lots of fanservice!
  • Completely custom soundtrack!

Shattered Rocket is a gaiden game to my Shattered series, with characters and settings also seen in Shattered Whirr and Shattered World, but no real heavy plot continuity that you need to look up to appreciate the game.
